From the sound of " Jie " and " 𧮫 ", it means to retreat. "Warring States Policy‧Qin Ceyi": "Abandoned soldiers, trembling with anger. The world is solid and Qin Li is two."

" But " can mean rejection or rejection. "Mencius-Wan Zhangxia": "But it is disrespectful."

" But " also means to postpone. Han Xunyue's "Han Ji-Wen Di Ji": "Shang Xun Yue went to Lin Yuan, the queen and Mrs. Shen tried to sit together in the ban, and sat in the office of the Lang, Mrs. Ang Choshen, Mrs. Shen was angry and refused to sit."

" But " also said to withdraw. Tang Dufu "Xi You": "Mu Sheng Gen Cen Ding, the towel is still unresolved."

" But " also means to return. Jin Chenshou "Yibu Older Miscellaneous Notes": "Blessed, with the sacred decree, listening to what Liang said, don't go for a few days, suddenly thinking about it and not fulfilling its meaning, but then riding on the horse and seeing the light."

" But " also means cessation and cessation. "Zhuangzi: Way of Heaven": "In the past, I had a thorn in my son, but now my heart is upright, why is it?" Cheng Xuanying said: "But, empty, breathe."

" But " is also used as a preposition. Tang Libai "Bye Lu Song": "Whoever is too high in the mountains, but Lulianjie; whoever speaks the Qin army, destroys Lulian."

" But " is also used as an adverb, which means repay and re. Tang Li Shangyin "Yeyu Jibei": "Why should I cut the candles at the west window together, but talk about the night rain in Bashan."

" But " is also used as a conjunction to express hu, huh. Tang Li Shangyin "Fuping Shaohou": "Don't collect gold bullets and throw them out of the forest, but regret the silver bed at the head of the well?"

" But " also means an auxiliary word, which is used after a verb to indicate the completion of an action. Tang Lu Changyuan <sentence>: "Suddenly a song became the king's heart, but it broke the wealth of the Chinese."

" But " also means temperance. "Said Wen": "Abstinence also. From Jie, 𧮫 sound."

humanum_full_description:
從「卩」，「𧮫」聲，表示使之退。《戰國策‧秦策一》：「棄甲兵，怒戰慄而卻。天下固量秦力二矣。」

　　「卻」可表示拒絕、推辭。《孟子‧萬章下》：「卻之卻之為不恭。」

　　「卻」也表示推後。漢荀悅《漢紀‧文帝紀上》：「上幸上林苑，皇后、慎夫人在禁中嘗同坐，及坐郎署，盎卻慎夫人席，慎夫人怒，不肯坐。」

　　「卻」還表示撤去。唐杜甫〈昔游〉：「暮昇艮岑頂，巾几猶未卻。」

　　「卻」也表示返回。晉陳壽《益部耆舊雜記》：「福往，具宣聖旨，聽亮所言，至別去數日，忽馳思未盡其意，遂卻馳騎還見亮。」

　　「卻」亦指止息、停止。《莊子‧天道》：「昔者吾有刺於子，今吾心正卻矣，何故也？」成玄英疏：「卻，空也，息也。」

　　「卻」還用作介詞。唐李白〈別魯頌〉：「誰道太山高，下卻魯連節；誰云秦軍眾，摧卻魯連舌。」

　　「卻」還用作副詞，表示還、再。唐李商隱〈夜雨寄北〉：「何當共剪西窗燭，卻話巴山夜雨時。」

　　「卻」也用作連詞，表示豈、難道。唐李商隱〈富平少侯〉：「不收金彈拋林外，卻惜銀床在井頭？」

　　「卻」亦表示助詞，用在動詞後面，表動作的完成。唐陸長源〈句〉：「忽然一曲稱君心，破卻中人百家產。」

　　「卻」還表示節制。《說文》：「節欲也。从卩，𧮫聲。」
